practiceAreas: Medical Malpractice|Brain Injury|Birth Injury|Personal Injury|MVA|Workers Comp|SSD|Nursing Home|Trucking Accidents|Animal Bites
description:
Serving all of central Pennsylvania, our team at Marzella & Associates takes an aggressive stance in medical malpractice and personal injury cases. The team at our law office has successfully advocated for victims of negligence and injury for more than 30 years, returning favorable results in matters that include:

• Birth injuries
• Nursing home negligence
• Motor vehicle accidents
• Premises liability incidents
• Workers' compensation
• Social Security Disability

In settlements and jury trials, our law office has obtained millions of dollars on behalf of our clients. In fact, several of our attorneys have earned membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. We have a reputation for battling large insurance providers, corporations and other entities that try to shortchange our clients.

Every case at our law office begins with a free initial consultation. During that time, prospective clients can share their stories with an attorney who is truly invested in correcting wrongdoing. Following that conversation, our top priority is to secure maximum compensation so our clients can move forward with their lives. The attorneys at Marzella & Associates keep in constant communication with the people we serve as we move through the legal system, whether that involves negotiating a fair settlement or going to court.
